name: A Night In Kyosaka
description:
A Night In Kyosaka

If you enjoyed the demo, please consider donating to our kickstarter campaign: 

Kickstarter.com/A_Night_in_Kyosaka

***Backgrounds in-game are temporary placeholders***

Made for all ages. No profanity.

This animated visual novel is about a young 10-year-old who wanders into a world ruled by dogs, cats, warlocks, and spirits in search of their missing puppy. Your job is to navigate through this mysterious world, looking for the lost pup, so that you both can venture back home together.

In this demo you will play as the boy character:

(Other genders will be available for full game release. )

All characters are voice acted except the character you play. We feel like this helps make the player feel immersed in the story. 

Other characters you'll encounter throughout the demo are:

We hope you enjoy the demo. As you can tell from the Mini Map we have lot of fun places for you to explore once the game gets funded.  Thank you very much.
